text: Yoh dilee Musa teuma geupeugah Geukheun bak Tuhan geuh hai kawom lon , Pakon ateuh lon tapeugot susah â€˜ Gata dum tapeusaket ate lon Ka tateupeue lon nyoe rasul Allah Peurintah Tuhan lon ba bak gata â€˜Oh ban ka nyata jih sisat leupah Tuhan peusisat treuk ate jih nyan Nyata treuk jih nyan awak nyang salah Han Neupeutunyok teuma di Tuhan Barangri kawom nyang pasek leupah
